content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore Pump at position (-9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler at position (-6.0, -0.5)
- Steam Engine at position (-2.5, -0.5)
- Connected by a PipeGroup with pipes at positions [(-7.5, -2.5), (-6.5, -2.5), (-8.5, -0.5), (-7.5, -0.5), (-7.5, -1.5)]

### Iron Ore Mining Station at Positions (15.5, 70.5) and (18.5, 70.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electric Mining Drill at position (15.5, 70.5) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (15.5, 72.5)
- Electric Mining Drill at position (18.5, 70.5) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (18.5, 72.5)
- Both drills are powered by an Electricity Group with poles at positions [(18.5, 20.5), (20.5, 22.5), (22.5, 24.5), ..., (25.5, 69.5), (13.5, 71.5), (23.5, 71.5)]

### Iron Gear Wheel Production Facility at Position (19.5, 77.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling Machine at position (19.5, 77.5) set to produce iron gear wheels
- Inserter at position (17.5, 77.5) to feed iron plates into the assembler
- Wooden Chest at position (21.5, 77.5) to collect iron gear wheels
- Connected to the power network with small electric poles

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Placing Entities at Occupied Positions
- Ensure that the target position for placing an entity is not occupied by another entity. Consider increasing the spacing, changing the direction, or altering the reference position.

### Assertion Errors for Production
- Verify that all necessary ingredients are available for production. Ensure that inserters are operational and feeding the correct items into the machines.

### Errors when Asserting Inserter Operation
- Ensure that inserters are correctly positioned and powered to operate. Verify that they are not in a waiting state due to lack of source items.

### Errors when Asserting Assembler Output
- Check that the assembler has all required resources and is connected to the power network. Ensure that the recipe is set correctly and that the input inventory is not empty.

### Errors when Placing Entities on Unplaceable Terrain
- Verify that the target location for placing an entity is suitable and not obstructed by unplaceable terrain like water.

## NAMESPACE

### Functions Defined by the Agent
- `get_entity(entity: Any, position: Any) -> Any`: Retrieves an entity at a given position.
- `rotate_entity(entity: Any, direction: Any) -> Any`: Rotates an entity in the specified direction.
- `pickup_entity(entity: Any, position: Any) -> Any`: Picks up an entity from a given position.

### Important Variables
- `power_source_position`: Position of the nearest power source.
- `pipes_to_steam_engine`: Connection status between boiler and steam engine using pipes.
- `chest_1`: Instance of a wooden chest placed to collect resources.
